ACGPF.summary: Accell Group N.V. designs, develops, produces, markets, and sells bicycles, and bicycle parts and accessories. The company primarily offers electric, city, recreational, transport, children's, mama, mountain, racing, and folding bikes, as well as speed pedelec; and accessories, such as helmets, clothing, bicycle racks, child trailers, and bags. It sells its products under the Haibike, Winora, Ghost, Batavus, Koga, Lapierre, Raleigh, Sparta, Babboe, Carqon, Tunturi, Atala, Loekie, Nishiki, Van Nicholas, Carraro Cicli, and XLC brands in the Netherlands, Germany, other European countries, and internationally. The company serves dealers and consumers. Accell Group N.V. is headquartered in Heerenveen, the Netherlands.

AJAX.AS.summary: AFC Ajax NV operates a football club primarily in the Netherlands. The company also operates a stadium and an youth academy. In addition, it sells tickets online. The company was founded in 1900 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

AJXA.F.summary: AFC Ajax NV operates a football club primarily in the Netherlands. The company also operates a stadium and an youth academy. In addition, it sells tickets online. The company was founded in 1900 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

BFIT.AS.summary: Basic-Fit N.V. operates fitness clubs in the Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg, France, and Spain. As of March 16, 2020, it operated 784 fitness clubs. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Hoofddorp, the Netherlands.

BSFFF.summary: Basic-Fit N.V. operates fitness clubs in the Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg, France, and Spain. As of March 16, 2020, it operated 784 fitness clubs. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Hoofddorp, the Netherlands.

SNOW.AS.summary: SnowWorld N.V. owns and operates indoor ski resorts in Landgraaf and Zoetermeer, the Netherlands. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Zoetermeer, the Netherlands.
